description: An illustration of a tall birthday cake: the sides of the bottom half of the cake are various shades of blue and the sides of the top half are various shades of pink; the top of the cake is split between blue and pink. The sides of the cake are segmented by line of downward-facing dark blue triangles. Atop the cake are four peaks of pink and blue frosting and a yellow and blue striped candle that is lit. The illustration is made out of a series of triangles of various sizes.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
